description: This Kotlin source file defines the NotesListFragment class, which is a UI component for displaying a list of notes with search functionality, navigation to note editing, and delete actions with an undo option. It manages view binding, interacts with a ViewModel for data, and updates UI elements based on LiveData observers.

classes.name: NotesListFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays a list of notes with search, delete with undo functionality, and navigation to note editor.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout and initializes view binding.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView adapter, click listeners, search filtering, observers for notes and snackbar messages.

methods.name: onDestroyView
methods.description: Clears the binding reference to avoid memory leaks.
